verbose_text: These observations demonstrate that non cytotoxic alpha-asarone (in PPE) is effective in blocking oxidized LDL internalization by disrupting the induction of SR-B1 and promoting the ABCA1 mediated cholesterol efflux from lipid-laden foam cells by triggering PPARgamma-LXRalpha signaling.
evidence: cholesterol efflux from lipid-laden foam cells by triggering PPARgamma-LXRalpha
